nodes.text: Hangar Six was a hangar bay located onboard the First Order's Resurgent-class Star Destroyer Finalizer. In 34 ABY, the Resistance pilot Poe Dameron and the stormtrooper Finn stole a TIE/sf space superiority fighter from Bay Two of the hangar and, after firing upon the other occupants of the hangar while detaching the starfighter's fuel cable, the pair managed to escape the Star Destroyer into the Jakku system.
